column4: How do I add program shortcuts in the Applications Menu? Thank you to whoever in advance.
johnny - I had this same problem, I used a different linux disc to erase the partition and then used ubuntu installation again and it worked
oh, another thing I tried to do, Johnny, was that instead of using the entire disc for a new partition
I left alot of free space behind
and then thats what finally worked
I've been meaning too loose wieght if thats what you ment, haha
i mean swap file.. not my body..
won't need it for this machine, I'm going to turn it into a machine only ment for n64, snes, MAME, and other old gaming.
i love open source cause easy to manage..no virus..
yeah, this is only my 4th day on Ubuntu. I have very high hopes so far for this Arcade-Machine project
